hero.description: I am a full-stack developer passionate about creating robust and scalable systems, especially using Golang and Node.js. Although I also have experience in front-end development with React and Next.js, my main focus is on the back-end, ensuring efficiency, performance, and scalability in the applications I develop.

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.description1: Full-stack developer with experience in back-end and DevOps, focused on building scalable and high-performance systems. Primarily working with Golang and Node.js, with additional experience in front-end development using React and Next.js.
about-me.description2: In back-end development, I have worked on projects ranging from simple CRUD applications to complex systems, applying query optimization in databases, particularly in MySQL (using NoCQL when needed). I have experience with various architectures, including MVC, Hexagonal, and Microservices.
about-me.description3: In DevOps, I specialize in building and maintaining AWS-based solutions, with expertise in deploying serverless architectures in both Golang and Node.js, leveraging Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, and S3 to ensure scalability and high availability.

description.react: I have experience with React in creating landing pages and complex web pages. I worked with componentization using ShadCN for modern UI and Framer Motion for animations. I developed interactive charts with Chart.js, Recharts, and D3.js and created dynamic forms with validation using React Hook Form and Zod. I always strive for best practices and optimization to improve the performance and usability of applications.
description.go: An efficient and concise language for high-performance systems, with excellent concurrency.
description.javascript: A widely used programming language for web development. It supports asynchronous programming and is essential for creating dynamic and interactive interfaces on both frontend and backend.
description.typescript: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and advanced development features, making code safer and easier to maintain.
description.nextjs: A React framework that enables hybrid rendering (SSR and SSG), advanced routing, and optimizations for better performance and SEO.
description.nodejs: An asynchronous, event-driven JavaScript runtime, ideal for scalable backend development, REST APIs, and real-time applications.
description.aws_lambda: AWS serverless computing service that allows running code without managing servers, charging only for execution time.
description.amazon_s3: A scalable and secure AWS object storage service used for storing files, backups, and static content.
description.dynamodb: An AWS NoSQL database with high availability and scalability, optimized for distributed data storage and performance.
description.postgresql: An open-source relational database with strong SQL support, known for its reliability, extensibility, and performance.
description.mysql: A popular relational database widely used for web applications and systems requiring structured storage and ACID transactions.
description.redis: An extremely fast in-memory database used for caching, queues, and session storage to improve application performance.
description.rust: A programming language focused on security, performance, and concurrency, widely used for low-level systems and high-performance applications.
description.python: A versatile and easy-to-learn language used for web development, data science, automation, and artificial intelligence.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I am a professional full-stack developer with expertise in creating robust web applications. With experience in both frontend and backend technologies, I can help bring your digital ideas to life with efficient, scalable solutions.

form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you soon!
form.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
